overview: It's no secret that if teleworking is so popular, it's also because it encourages the development of the libido! Illustration with the beautiful Tiffany who, working quietly at home, called in emergency the computer specialist of her company for a breakdown service... Clever, Anna has adopted the opposite strategy: since everyone is teleworking, she has chosen to be alone at the office with her colleague on whom she secretly fantasizes.
title: Télétravail mode d'emploi
